title: Power Control with QoS Guarantees: A Differentiable Projection-based Unsupervised Learning Framework. (arXiv:2306.01787v1 [cs.NI])
abstract: Deep neural networks (DNNs) are emerging as a potential solution to solve NP-hard wireless resource allocation problems. However, in the presence of intricate constraints, e.g., users' quality-of-service (QoS) constraints, guaranteeing constraint satisfaction becomes a fundamental challenge. In this paper, we propose a novel unsupervised learning framework to solve the classical power control problem in a multi-user interference channel, where the objective is to maximize the network sumrate under users' minimum data rate or QoS requirements and power budget constraints. tldr: 本文提出了一种基于可微投影的无监督学习框架来解决多用户干扰信道中的功率控制问题，并在用户QoS要求和功率预算约束下最大化网络总速率。通过两种不同的深度学习(DL)解决方案(DIPNet和DEPNet)来实现，仿真结果表明该算法比现有方案更具竞争力。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a novel unsupervised learning framework based on differentiable projection function to solve the power control problem in the multi-user interference channel, with the objective of maximizing the network sumrate under users' minimum data rate or QoS requirements and power budget constraints. Two deep learning solutions, DIPNet and DEPNet, are pursued. Simulation results show that the proposed algorithm is more competitive than existing solutions.
